DocAttribute.Name: EdgeList
DocAttribute.Documentation: A list of oriented edge entities which are concatenated together to form this path.

DocAttribute.Name: Ne
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of elements in the edge list.

DocWhereRule.Name: IsClosed
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The start vertex of the first edge shall be the same as the end vertex of the last edge. This ensures that the path is closed to form a loop.

DocWhereRule.Name: IsContinuous
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The end vertex of each edge shall be the same as the start vertex of its successor.
